00018 /*************************************************
00019      MARSAGLIA pseudo random number generator
00020      See: G. Marsaglia and A. Zaman. Toward a universal random number generator,
00021           Statistics & Probability Letters, 9(1):35â€“39, 1990.
00022      This function returns a double precision floating point number 
00023      uniformly distributed in the range [0,1)
00024 *************************************************/
00025
